Biosilk Silk Therapy Shampoo - Imported (350 ml) Price: Rs.2300

Biosilk Silk Therapy Shampoo Cleanse 12 fl oz (350 ml). Due to packaging updates the image shown may temporarily appear different from the product received. BioSilk Silk Therapy Shampoo with botanical extracts and herbs is ideal for all hair types and leaves hair healthy and manageable. Silk proteins penetrate hair to condition and create incredible shine. Not tested on animals.
